item.title: 'Your countries are going to hell': Trump bashes UN, world leaders in speech
item.description: President Donald Trump is speaking at the United Nations General Assembly, as world leaders convene in New York for the body's 80th session.

item.title: WATCH: Trump tells European Union nations: 'Your countries are going to hell'
item.description: President Donald Trump criticized the European Union's immigration policies while speaking at the United Nations General Assembly on Tuesday.

item.title: Trump distorts facts on autism, Tylenol and vaccines, scientists say
item.description: Scientists say that Trump distorted facts on vaccines, Tylenol and autism during a news conference in which he encouraged pregnant women not to take t...

item.title: 15-year-old detained in El Paso shooting that left 5 teens wounded: Police
item.description: A 15-year-old boy was detained for questioning in a shooting that left five teenagers wounded on Monday night in El Paso, Texas, authorities said.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
